Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Southbound Reroute near Ashland/Lake
ShortDescription: Southbound 9 Ashland buses are rerouted via Ashland, Fulton, Ogden, Washington and Ashland, over normal route, due to a street blockage near Ashland/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Fulton, Ogden, Washington and Ashland then resume their normal route, due to a street blockage near Ashland/Lake.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with delays 47th due to earlier police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with delays 47th due to earlier police activity.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
